bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names sun zhui 損墜 ; duo shang 墮傷 , damage from a fall; zhui shang 墜傷. Pathological Condition of shang sun 傷損 , injury, resulting from a fall from somewhere high. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29 ：近效療墜損方，生地黃一斤，分為三份。右每服取一份 , “The JXF’s recipe to cure injuries from a fall : divide 1 jin of fresh di huang into three portions. Of these take one portion for each ingestion”.
